document_data.name: Iorg Brokenjaw
document_data.mainbody: '''Iorg Brokenjaw''' was a [[dwarf]] jailer at [[Grimshackle Jail]] in [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Despite what he did, Iorg was a man of his word, and he always respected his words. He was a well-spoken individual using brief and terse sentences.
document_data.History: In 1489 DR, he was bribed to free the [[Gray Patriots]]'s member [[Rathene Fel]].{{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|9}} In order to do this, he instigated a prison break in order to distract the other jailers and free Rathene. However, thanks to an adventuring party there to interrogate her, his plan backfired. Out of desperation, he took [[Ukharim Grimshackle]] hostage. The adventurers somehow resolved the situation.{{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|12}}
